member.name: T:s4pi.WrapperDealer.WrapperDealer
member.summary: Responsible for associating ResourceType in the IResourceIndexEntry with a particular class (a "wrapper") that understands it or the default wrapper.

member.name: M:s4pi.WrapperDealer.WrapperDealer.CreateNewResource(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new Resource of the requested type, allowing the wrapper to initialise it appropriately
member.param: Type of resource (currently a string like "0xDEADBEEF")

member.name: M:s4pi.WrapperDealer.WrapperDealer.GetResource(System.Int32,s4pi.Interfaces.IPackage,s4pi.Interfaces.IResourceIndexEntry)
member.summary: Retrieve a resource from a package, readying the appropriate wrapper

member.name: M:s4pi.WrapperDealer.WrapperDealer.GetResource(System.Int32,s4pi.Interfaces.IPackage,s4pi.Interfaces.IResourceIndexEntry,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieve a resource from a package, readying the appropriate wrapper or the default wrapper
member.param: When true, indicates WrapperDealer should always use the DefaultResource wrapper

member.name: P:s4pi.WrapperDealer.WrapperDealer.TypeMap
member.summary: Retrieve the resource wrappers known to WrapperDealer.

member.name: P:s4pi.WrapperDealer.WrapperDealer.Disabled
member.summary: Access the collection of wrappers on the "disabled" list.
member.remarks: Updates to entries in the collection will be used next time a wrapper is requested. Existing instances of a disabled wrapper will not be invalidated and it will remain possible to bypass WrapperDealer and instantiate instances of the wrapper class directly.
